No. 207626)} Sub: Extension of Special Concessions/lncentives to the Central Government (NHAI) Employees working in Kashmir Valley for a further period of three years W.e.f. 01.08.2024-reg: Consequent upon the approval of the Competent Authority and in continuation to the Policy Circular No.1.2.6.1/2020 dated 21.01.2020 and 1.2.6.2/2023 dated 21.06.2023, it has been decided to adopt the Department of Personnel and  Training (DoP&T)'s Office Memorandum No. A- 24011/3/2025-Estt: (Leave) dated 24.02.2025 (Copy enclosed) related to Extension of Special Concessions / Facilities to Central Government Employees working in Kashmir Valley for a further period of three years W.e.f. 01.08.2024, to the Officers & Employees of NHAI. It has also been decided that, as and when any modification extension is made to the ibid OM dated 24.02.2025 in future, the same shall be mutatis mutandis applicable to the Officers & Employees of NHAI also. 2. This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. Encl: As above 67lo2 (CS. Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord.)
